faqs.topic: I cannot see my board, medium, class and subject
faqs.description: Your State does not currently support all boards, mediums, classes and subjects. As soon as your State adds them, you will see it in the list

videos.name: How do I download content from {instance} Library?

faqs.topic: I have downloaded content, but I am unable to play it because it says that I need the Internet
faqs.description: You may have downloaded YouTube content. You can play YouTube content only when you are online. Connect the computer to the Internet try again.

faqs.topic: I do not have access to a laptop with an Internet connection, but I want to add or update content on the desktop app
faqs.description:
If you have a mobile phone,
  • download the DIKSHA mobile app from the google playstore.
  • Browse for the content in the app.
  • Download the content from the DIKSHA library.
  • Copy it on a pendrive or SD card and upload it to the DIKSHA desktop app.

faqs.topic: I need to update my DIKSHA desktop app
faqs.description: Connect your computer to the Internet and check https://diksha.gov.in/download/desktopapp for the latest app version

faqs.topic: I do not find content for a particular topic, or I find the content irrelevant
faqs.description: Browse DIKSHA's online library to search for the content. If it is still unavailable, send your feedback about content to the State SCERT

faqs.topic: I cannot access courses when am offline
faqs.description: Courses are available only when you are connected to the internet

faqs.topic: My profile does not reflect my course progress correctly
faqs.description: To update your course progress in your profile, go to My learnings. Click on the Course. After the course opens, go to the kebab menu (three vertical dots on the right)> click Sync progress now. Wait for a few minutes. Your profile should now reflect your correct course progress

To speed up the app performance, do the following:
Go to your computerâ€™s system configuration. The minimum configuration should be:
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Dual Core Processor

If your computer matches or exceeds this configuration, restart the app.
After doing this, if it is still slow, go to Task Manager, select all unused background processes and click End Task

faqs.topic: I had loaded content on my pendrive, but now I see that it is empty
faqs.description:
Your pendrive or computer may be infected with a virus. Check that:
  • You have an anti virus software installed on your machine
  • Your pendrive is write-protected before you plug it into unknown machines

faqs.topic: It takes time to copy content to and from my pendrive
faqs.description: The time taken to copy depends on the size of the content file. Some large textbooks take time to copy. We recommend that you do not stop the process in between. Doing so may lead to inconsistent files.

faqs.topic: My computer does not have any free space because of DIKSHA content
faqs.description: Delete downloaded content from the My Downloads tab of the app to free up space on your computer

videos.name: How do I copy content to my pen drive?
How do I copy content to my pen drive joyful theme

faqs.topic: I am unable to copy content to a pendrive
faqs.description:
To copy the content to a pen drive, do the following:
  • Go to your computer Settings. Check if the USB drive is write-protected. If it is, disable the protection
  • Check if the pen drive has free space. Delete unwanted files from the pendrive

faqs.topic: Unable to install DIKSHA Desktop application on my Ubuntu system
faqs.description:
To install DIKSHA Desktop application on your ubuntu system:

1) Open your terminal

2) Run the command cd <location> to change the directory to where the deb file is downloaded. For example, if the deb is saved in the downloads folder, then run the command cd Downloads

3) Run the command sudo dpkg -i <filename>

On successfully running this command the application is launched

faqs.topic: I want to register on DIKSHA
faqs.description:
To register on DIKSHA:
  • Go to Explore DIKSHA
  • Select whether you are a teacher or a student
  • Update your location details
  • Click on the profile icon
  • Click Login
  • Click Register here on the login screen
  • For details on how to register refer https://diksha.gov.in/help/getting-started/sign-in/sign-up.html

To reset your password, follow these steps and recover your account:

  • Click Forgot Password
  • Enter the email address or mobile number and user name that you provided while registering on DIKSHA
  • You will receive an OTP on your registered email or mobile number
  • Enter the OTP to reset your password and recover your account
  • For details to reset your password, refer Recover password

faqs.topic: I want to login on DIKSHA through my State portal
faqs.description:
To login to DIKSHA through your State portal:

  • Go to Explore DIKSHA 
  • Select that you are a Teacher
  • Select your location 
  • Click the Profile icon
  • Click Login
  • Select Login with State system
  • Select your State
  • You will be redirected to your State portal
  • Enter the User name and Password as given to you by your State in the Login screen 
  • Click Submit
  • For details to log in through the State portal, refer Sign Up

videos.name: How do I add users on {instance}
How do I add users on {instance} joyful theme

faqs.topic: I want to edit my profile details
faqs.description:
You can edit the following details in your Profile:
  • Personal details such as name, State, and district
  • Contact details such as a mobile number and email address
  • Other details such as board, medium, subject, and class
    • For details on how to edit profile details, refer User profile

constants.knowMoreMsg: What more would you like to know?
constants.resolveMsg: Get help with finding content, technical issues and more. Browse through the topics to find FAQs, help videos and more.
constants.tellMoreMsg: Tell us more about the problem you faced
constants.thanksForFeedbackMsg: Thanks for your feedback. We may not be able to respond to every suggestion sent to us, but your feedback is valuable. It helps make {{app_name}} better for everyone.
constants.triggerEmailMsg: After you add details in the text box and tap the Initiate email button, we will trigger an email on your behalf. You can add further details and/or attach files there.
